title: Fix Today screen: remove Edit Promise option and restore thumbs up/down reflection

requirements.text: Update the Today page so that after a user creates/saves a promise, the UI shows the reflection controls (thumbs up and thumbs down) instead of an “Edit Promise” button, and the promise text is not editable after creation.

quotes: it then showed the promise text as expected, but with an edit button instead of the thumbs up and thumbs down buttons. there shouldn't be an option to edit the promise

acceptanceCriteria: After tapping “Make Promise” and seeing the saved promise, there is no “Edit Promise” button and no way to return to an editable text input for that same day’s promise.
The saved promise view displays two reflection actions: thumbs up and thumbs down (not a generic edit action).

The thumbs controls use the existing generated assets: frontend/public/assets/generated/thumbs-up.dim_128x128.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/thumbs-down.dim_128x128.png (or equivalent icon rendering already used elsewhere in the app).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not edit immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not add any new promise editing feature or UI entry point.
Do not change Internet Identity authentication behavior.
Do not introduce any new backend schema or backend endpoints for this fix.
